title: Scary Tales for Dark Nights, Vol. 1
description: A Dozen Tales to Chill Your BonesScary Tales for Dark Nights will make you wish you had turned on the lights. Pull the covers close—no hanging a foot over the edge now—and keep one eye on the closet door. What's that sound? Oh, it's just the wind, you tell yourself. Steady your trembling hands. Calm your pounding heart. Are you ready? Then, let's start...Jessica hears scratching and growling at her new house, and it's not some harmless animal trying to get out of the basement.An urban explorer visits the site of mass murder at an old cult commune to make videos that he hopes will go viral, but he finds something far worse than an abandoned mansion covered in spiderwebs and debris.A trail runner goes into the forest to train for an upcoming race but soon realizes she's become the prey of a creature she never knew existed.Read these and other terrifying tales of ghosts, monsters, vampires, shifters, and more from the twisted mind of C S C Shows.
author: C.S.C. Shows
